channel.title: Extreme Help Needed
channel.description:
Well, I have made a runescape private server and I was wondering how I could share it. How can I make it on say client instead of opening a source and client? Can you guys help?
Thanks, Arham

item.title: Extreme Help Needed
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:344468”]Urgh! I mean to share. I open a runescape private server ip changer client and a source. But when I look at other servers, you only need to press run and you play to game. There!

Thanks, Sorry for rudeness,
Arham[/quote]

Uhm you’d need to run the source on a computer, keep it running and change the ip in the gui.java file.
Basically you need 2 clients.
1 for other players
and
1 for you

In the client for other players, the ip in the gui.java file should be the ip of your server, aka your computer ip. If you don’t know your ip go to [urlhttp://www.whatsmyip.org/[/url]

In the client for you, the ip in the gui.java file should be 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
